tasks.description: The plans below show a student room for two people and a student room for one person at an Australian university.

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: In the modern world, people no longer need to use food or products from animals, such as medicine and clothing. Do you agree or disagree with that statement?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
